IDS.name: Actuator
IDS.documentation: Generic simple description of a heating/current drive actuator, for a first simplified version of the Plasma Simulator component

field.name: IDS_Properties
field.documentation: Interface Data Structure properties. This element identifies the node above as an IDS

field.name: Status_of
field.documentation: Status of this structure 'OK' if the structure was created consistently, 'PARTIAL' if not complete, 'INCONSISTENT' if complete but not guaranteed consistent

field.name: Comment_of
field.documentation: Any additional comment from the source application

field.name: Creator_of
field.documentation: Creator of this consistent IDS

field.name: Date_of
field.documentation: Date of consistent creation of this IDS

field.name: Source_of
field.documentation: Where do the data for this IDS come from (a procedure, a set of codes)

field.name: Reference_of
field.documentation: Documented reference to this IDS data

field.name: Homogeneous_Timebase
field.documentation: 1 if the Timebase of this IDS is homogeneous. In this case, the Timebase values for this IDS are stored in ../Timebase just below the root of this IDS. Otherwise, the time values are stored in the various Timebase fields at lower levels in the tree.

field.name: cocos
field.documentation: Coordinate conventions of this IDS

field.name: Name
field.documentation: Name of the actuator (IC, EC, NBI, LH)

field.name: Channels
field.documentation: ID of the multiple channels of the actuator: Beam boxes for NBI, EC or IC launcher, ...

field.name: Power
field.documentation: Power delivered at the output of the actuator, in the vessel (NB this is before the coupling / beam blocking / shine through / orbit losses calculations)

field.name: Generic_Signal
field.documentation: Generic 2D signal slot for storing an actuator control parameter (e.g. the angle of an ECRH mirror)

field.name: Code_Parameters
field.documentation: Generic decription of the code specific parameters for the code that has produced this IDS

field.name: Code_Name
field.documentation: Name of the code

field.name: Code_Version
field.documentation: Version of the code

field.name: Parameters
field.documentation: List of the code specific parameters in XML format

field.name: Output_Diagnostics
field.documentation: List of the code specific diagnostic/output in XML format

field.name: Output_Flag
field.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values mean some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used.

field.name: Timebase
field.documentation: Generic timebase [s]

IDS.name: Core_Profiles
IDS.documentation: Core plasma 1D profiles. TBD: toroidal and poloidal velocities. Errorbars to be added.

field.name: IDS_Properties
field.documentation: Interface Data Structure properties. This element identifies the node above as an IDS

field.name: Status_of
field.documentation: Status of this structure 'OK' if the structure was created consistently, 'PARTIAL' if not complete, 'INCONSISTENT' if complete but not guaranteed consistent

field.name: Comment_of
field.documentation: Any additional comment from the source application

field.name: Creator_of
field.documentation: Creator of this consistent IDS

field.name: Date_of
field.documentation: Date of consistent creation of this IDS

field.name: Source_of
field.documentation: Where do the data for this IDS come from (a procedure, a set of codes)

field.name: Reference_of
field.documentation: Documented reference to this IDS data

field.name: Homogeneous_Timebase
field.documentation: 1 if the Timebase of this IDS is homogeneous. In this case, the Timebase values for this IDS are stored in ../Timebase just below the root of this IDS. Otherwise, the time values are stored in the various Timebase fields at lower levels in the tree.

field.name: cocos
field.documentation: Coordinate conventions of this IDS

field.name: Rho_Tor_Norm
field.documentation: Normalised toroidal flux coordinate. The normalizing value for Rho_Tor_Norm, is the toroidal flux coordinate at the equilibrium boundary (LCFS or 99.x % of the LCFS in case of a fixed boundary equilibium calculation)

field.name: Vacuum_Toroidal_Field
field.documentation: Characteristics of the vacuum toroidal field (used in Rho_Tor definition and in the normalization of current densities)

field.name: R0
field.documentation: Reference major radius where the vacuum toroidal magnetic field is given (usually a fixed position such as the middle of the vessel at the equatorial midplane)

field.name: B0
field.documentation: Vacuum toroidal field at R0 [T]; Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewed from above. The product R0B0 must be consistent with the B_Tor_Vacuum_R field of the TF IDS.

field.name: Plasma_Composition
field.documentation: Generic declaration of Plasma Composition for a simulation

field.name: Ions
field.documentation: Array of plasma ions

field.name: A
field.documentation: Mass of atom

field.name: Zion
field.documentation: Ion charge (of the dominant ionisation state; lumped ions are allowed)

field.name: Zn
field.documentation: Nuclear charge

field.name: Label
field.documentation: String identifying ion (e.g. H+, D+, T+, He+2, C+, ...)

field.name: Multiple_Charge_State_Flag
field.documentation: Multiple charge state calculation flag : 0-Only one charge state is considered; 1-Multiple charge state are considered and are described in the Charge_States structure

field.name: Charge_States
field.documentation: Array of charge states considered for this ion (non-empty if Multiple_Charge_State_Flag = 1)

field.name: Z_Min
field.documentation: Minimum Z of the charge state bundle

field.name: Z_Max
field.documentation: Maximum Z of the charge state bundle

field.name: Label
field.documentation: String identifying charge state (e.g. C+, C+2 , C+3, C+4, C+5, C+6, ...)

field.name: Neutrals
field.documentation: Array of neutrals

field.name: Components
field.documentation: Array of components to the atom or molecule

field.name: A
field.documentation: Mass of atom

field.name: Zn
field.documentation: Nuclear charge

field.name: Multiplicity
field.documentation: Multiplicity of the atom

field.name: Energies
field.documentation: Types energies considered for this neutral species : 0=cold, 1=thermal, 2= fast, 3=NBI

field.name: Label
field.documentation: String identifying the atom or molecule (e.g. D2, DT, CD4, ...)

field.name: Psi
field.documentation: Poloidal magnetic flux

field.name: Te
field.documentation: Electron temperature

field.name: Ti
field.documentation: Ion temperature

field.name: Ne
field.documentation: Electron density (thermal+non-thermal)

field.name: Ne_Fast
field.documentation: Density of fast (non-thermal) electrons

field.name: Ni
field.documentation: Ion density (thermal+non-thermal)

field.name: Ni_Fast
field.documentation: Density of fast (non-thermal) ions, for the various ion species

field.name: Ni_Total_Over_Ne
field.documentation: Ratio of total ion density (sum over species) over electron density. (thermal+non-thermal)

field.name: Zeff
field.documentation: Effective charge

field.name: Pe
field.documentation: Electron pressure

field.name: Pi
field.documentation: Ion pressure (per ion species)

field.name: Pi_Total
field.documentation: Total ion pressure (sum over the ion species)

field.name: Pressure_Thermal
field.documentation: Thermal pressure (electrons+ions)

field.name: Pressure_Perpendicular
field.documentation: Total perpendicular pressure (electrons+ions, thermal+non-thermal)

field.name: Pressure_Parallel
field.documentation: Total parallel pressure (electrons+ions, thermal+non-thermal)

field.name: J_Total
field.documentation: Total parallel current density = average(jtot.B) / B0, where B0 = Core_Profiles/Vacuum_Toroidal_Field/ B0

field.name: J_Tor
field.documentation: Total toroidal current density = average(J_Tor/R) / average(1/R)

field.name: J_Ohmic
field.documentation: Ohmic parallel current density = average(J_Ohmic.B) / B0, where B0 = Core_Profiles/Vacuum_Toroidal_Field/ B0

field.name: J_Non_Inductive
field.documentation: Non-inductive (includes bootstrap) parallel current density = average(jni.B) / B0, where B0 = Core_Profiles/Vacuum_Toroidal_Field/ B0

field.name: J_Bootstrap
field.documentation: Bootstrap parallel current density = average(J_Bootstrap.B) / B0, where B0 = Core_Profiles/Vacuum_Toroidal_Field/ B0

field.name: Conductivity_Parallel
field.documentation: Parallel conductivity

field.name: E_Parallel
field.documentation: Parallel electric field = average(E.B) / B0, where Core_Profiles/Vacuum_Toroidal_Field/ B0

field.name: q
field.documentation: Safety factor

field.name: Magnetic_Shear
field.documentation: Magnetic shear

field.name: Momentum_Tor
field.documentation: Toroidal momentum of the various ion species

field.name: Rotation_Frequency_Tor
field.documentation: Angular toroidal rotation frequency of the various ion species

field.name: Global
field.documentation: Various global quantities derived from the Core_Profiles

field.name: Ip
field.documentation: Total plasma current

field.name: Current_Non_Inductive
field.documentation: Total non-inductive parallel current

field.name: Current_Bootstrap
field.documentation: Bootstrap parallel current

field.name: V_Loop
field.documentation: LCFS loop voltage

field.name: li_3
field.documentation: Internal inductance

field.name: Beta_Tor
field.documentation: Toroidal beta (ratio of kinetic to magnetic pressure)

field.name: Beta_Tor_Norm
field.documentation: Normalised toroidal beta

field.name: Beta_Pol
field.documentation: Poloidal beta

field.name: Energy_Diamagnetic
field.documentation: Plasma energy content = 3/2 * int(p,dV) with p being the total pressure (Pressure_Thermal + Pressure_Perpendicular)

field.name: Code_Parameters
field.documentation: Generic decription of the code specific parameters for the code that has produced this IDS

field.name: Code_Name
field.documentation: Name of the code

field.name: Code_Version
field.documentation: Version of the code

field.name: Parameters
field.documentation: List of the code specific parameters in XML format

field.name: Output_Diagnostics
field.documentation: List of the code specific diagnostic/output in XML format

field.name: Output_Flag
field.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values mean some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used.

field.name: Timebase
field.documentation: Generic timebase [s]

IDS.name: Equilibrium
IDS.documentation: Description of a 2D, axi-symmetric, tokamak equilibrium; result of an equilibrium code.

field.name: IDS_Properties
field.documentation: Interface Data Structure properties. This element identifies the node above as an IDS

field.name: Status_of
field.documentation: Status of this structure 'OK' if the structure was created consistently, 'PARTIAL' if not complete, 'INCONSISTENT' if complete but not guaranteed consistent

field.name: Comment_of
field.documentation: Any additional comment from the source application

field.name: Creator_of
field.documentation: Creator of this consistent IDS

field.name: Date_of
field.documentation: Date of consistent creation of this IDS

field.name: Source_of
field.documentation: Where do the data for this IDS come from (a procedure, a set of codes)

field.name: Reference_of
field.documentation: Documented reference to this IDS data

field.name: Homogeneous_Timebase
field.documentation: 1 if the Timebase of this IDS is homogeneous. In this case, the Timebase values for this IDS are stored in ../Timebase just below the root of this IDS. Otherwise, the time values are stored in the various Timebase fields at lower levels in the tree.

field.name: cocos
field.documentation: Coordinate conventions of this IDS

field.name: Boundary
field.documentation: Description of the plasma boundary

field.name: Type
field.documentation: 0 (limiter) or 1 (diverted)

field.name: N_Outline_Points
field.documentation: Number of meaningful Outline points in R and Z at a given time.

field.name: Outline_RZ
field.documentation: RZ description of the plasma boundary. The second dimension is oversized to fit the maximum number of (R,Z) points over the time range

field.name: Geometric_Axis_RZ
field.documentation: RZ position of the geometric axis (defined as (Rmin+Rmax) / 2 of the boundary)

field.name: a_minor
field.documentation: Minor radius of the plasma boundary (defined as (Rmax-Rmin) / 2 of the boundary)

field.name: Elongation
field.documentation: Elongation of the plasma boundary

field.name: Elongation_Upper
field.documentation: Elongation (upper half w.r.t. geometric axis) of the plasma boundary

field.name: Elongation_Lower
field.documentation: Elongation (lower half w.r.t. geometric axis) of the plasma boundary

field.name: Triangularity_Upper
field.documentation: Upper triangularity of the plasma boundary

field.name: Triangularity_Lower
field.documentation: Lower triangularity of the plasma boundary

field.name: N_X_Points
field.documentation: Number of X points at a given time

field.name: X_Points_RZ
field.documentation: RZ position of the X points, first is the active X point if diverted. The second dimension is oversized to fit the maximum number of X points over the time range

field.name: Strike_Point_Lower_Left_RZ
field.documentation: RZ position of the lower left strike point

field.name: Strike_Point_Upper_Left_RZ
field.documentation: RZ position of the upper left strike point

field.name: Strike_Point_Lower_Right_RZ
field.documentation: RZ position of the lower right strike point

field.name: Strike_Point_Upper_Right_RZ
field.documentation: RZ position of the upper right strike point

field.name: Active_Limiter_Point_RZ
field.documentation: RZ position of the active limiter point (point of the plasma boundary in contact with the limiter)

field.name: Global
field.documentation: 0D parameters of the equilibrium

field.name: Beta_Pol
field.documentation: Poloidal beta

field.name: Beta_Tor
field.documentation: Toroidal beta

field.name: Beta_Normal
field.documentation: Normalised toroidal beta

field.name: Ip
field.documentation: Plasma current. Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewed from above.

field.name: li_3
field.documentation: Internal inductance

field.name: Volume
field.documentation: Total plasma volume

field.name: Area
field.documentation: Area of the poloidal cross section

field.name: Psi_Axis
field.documentation: Poloidal flux at the magnetic axis

field.name: Psi_Boundary
field.documentation: Poloidal flux at the selected plasma boundary

field.name: Magnetic_Axis
field.documentation: Magnetic axis position

field.name: R
field.documentation: Major radius

field.name: B_Tor_Axis
field.documentation: Total toroidal magnetic field at the magnetic axis

field.name: q_Axis
field.documentation: q at the magnetic axis

field.name: q_95
field.documentation: q at the 95% poloidal flux surface

field.name: q_Min
field.documentation: Minimum q value in the plasma

field.name: Vacuum_Toroidal_Field
field.documentation: Characteristics of the vacuum toroidal field

field.name: R0
field.documentation: Reference major radius where the vacuum toroidal magnetic field is given (usually a fixed position such as the middle of the vessel at the equatorial midplane)

field.name: B0
field.documentation: Vacuum toroidal field at R0 [T]; Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewed from above. The product R0B0 must be consistent with the B_Tor_Vacuum_R field of the TF IDS.

field.name: W_MHD
field.documentation: Plasma energy content = 3/2 * int(p,dV) with p being the total pressure (thermal + fast particles) [J]. Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: Gamma
field.documentation: Adiabatic index

field.name: Profiles_1D
field.documentation: Equilibrium profiles (1D radial grid) as a function of the poloidal flux

field.name: Psi
field.documentation: Poloidal flux, such that Bp=|grad psi| /R/2/pi

field.name: Phi
field.documentation: Toroidal flux

field.name: F
field.documentation: Diamagnetic function (F=R B_Phi)

field.name: dPressure_dPsi
field.documentation: Derivative of Pressure w.r.t. Psi

field.name: F_dF_dPsi
field.documentation: Derivative of F w.r.t. Psi, multiplied with F

field.name: J_Tor
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged toroidal current density = average(J_TorR) / average(1/R)

field.name: J_Parallel
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged parallel current density = average(j.B) / B0, where B0 = Equilibrium/Global/Toroidal_Field/B0

field.name: q
field.documentation: Safety factor

field.name: Magnetic_Shear
field.documentation: Magnetic shear

field.name: R_Inboard
field.documentation: Radial coordinate (major radius) on the inboard side of the magnetic axis

field.name: R_Outboard
field.documentation: Radial coordinate (major radius) on the outboard side of the magnetic axis

field.name: Rho_Tor
field.documentation: Toroidal flux coordinate, defined as sqrt(Phi/pi/B0), where B0 = Equilibrium/Global/Toroidal_Field/B0

field.name: dPsi_dRho_Tor
field.documentation: Derivative of Psi with respect to Rho_Tor

field.name: Rho_Vol_Norm
field.documentation: Normalised radial coordinate related to the plasma volume. Defined as sqrt(volume / volume[LCFS])

field.name: Triangularity_Upper
field.documentation: Upper triangularity w.r.t. magnetic axis

field.name: Triangularity_Lower
field.documentation: Lower triangularity w.r.t. magnetic axis

field.name: Volume
field.documentation: Volume enclosed in the flux surface

field.name: dVolume_dPsi
field.documentation: Radial derivative of the volume enclosed in the flux surface with respect to Psi

field.name: dVolume_dRho_Tor
field.documentation: Radial derivative of the volume enclosed in the flux surface with respect to Rho_Tor

field.name: Area
field.documentation: Cross-sectional area of the flux surface

field.name: dArea_dPsi
field.documentation: Radial derivative of the cross-sectional area of the flux surface with respect to Psi

field.name: Surface
field.documentation: Surface area of the toroidal flux surface

field.name: Trapped_Fraction
field.documentation: Trapped particle fraction

field.name: gm1
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged 1/R^2

field.name: gm2
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged grad_rho^2/R^2

field.name: gm3
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged grad_rho^2

field.name: gm4
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged 1/B^2

field.name: gm5
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged B^2

field.name: gm6
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged grad_rho^2/B^2

field.name: gm7
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged grad_rho

field.name: gm8
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged R

field.name: gm9
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged 1/R

field.name: B_Average
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged B

field.name: B_Min
field.documentation: Minimum(B) on the flux surface

field.name: B_Max
field.documentation: Maximum(B) on the flux surface

field.name: Profiles_2D
field.documentation: Equilibrium 2D profiles in the poloidal plane. Multiple 2D representations of the equilibrium can be stored here.

field.name: Grid_Type
field.documentation: Selection of one of a set of grid types. 1-rectangular (R,Z) grid, in this case the position arrays should not be filled since they are redundant with grid/dim1 and dim2.

field.name: Grid
field.documentation: Definition of the 2D grid

field.name: Dim1
field.documentation: First dimension values

field.name: Dim2
field.documentation: Second dimension values

field.name: R
field.documentation: Values of the major radius on the grid

field.name: Z
field.documentation: Values of the Height on the grid

field.name: Psi
field.documentation: Values of the poloidal flux at the grid in the poloidal plane

field.name: Theta
field.documentation: Values of the poloidal angle on the grid

field.name: Phi
field.documentation: Toroidal flux

field.name: J_Tor
field.documentation: Toroidal plasma current density

field.name: J_Parallel
field.documentation: Parallel (to magnetic field) plasma current density

field.name: B_R
field.documentation: R component of the poloidal magnetic field

field.name: B_Z
field.documentation: Z component of the poloidal magnetic field

field.name: B_Tor
field.documentation: Toroidal component of the magnetic field

field.name: Coordinate_System
field.documentation: Flux surface coordinate system on a square grid of flux and poloidal angle

field.name: Grid_Type
field.documentation: Type of coordinate system

field.name: Grid
field.documentation: Definition of the 2D grid

field.name: Dim1
field.documentation: First dimension values

field.name: Dim2
field.documentation: Second dimension values

field.name: R
field.documentation: Values of the major radius on the grid

field.name: Z
field.documentation: Values of the Height on the grid

field.name: Jacobian
field.documentation: Jacobian of the coordinate system

field.name: g_11
field.documentation: metric coefficients g_11; g_ij=g^ij are contravariant metric tensor for the grid described by grid_type

field.name: g_12
field.documentation: metric coefficients g_12; g_ij=g^ij are contravariant metric tensor for the grid described by grid_type

field.name: g_13
field.documentation: metric coefficients g_13; g_ij=g^ij are contravariant metric tensor for the grid described by grid_type

field.name: g_22
field.documentation: metric coefficients g_22; g_ij=g^ij are contravariant metric tensor for the grid described by grid_type

field.name: g_23
field.documentation: metric coefficients g_23; g_ij=g^ij are contravariant metric tensor for the grid described by grid_type

field.name: g_33
field.documentation: metric coefficients g_33; g_ij=g^ij are contravariant metric tensor for the grid described by grid_type

field.name: Code_Parameters
field.documentation: Generic decription of the code specific parameters for the code that has produced this IDS

field.name: Code_Name
field.documentation: Name of the code

field.name: Code_Version
field.documentation: Version of the code

field.name: Parameters
field.documentation: List of the code specific parameters in XML format

field.name: Output_Flag
field.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values mean some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used.

field.name: Timebase
field.documentation: Generic timebase [s]

IDS.name: Magnetics
IDS.documentation: Magnetic diagnostics for equilibrium identification and plasma shape control.

field.name: IDS_Properties
field.documentation: Interface Data Structure properties. This element identifies the node above as an IDS

field.name: Flux_Loops
field.documentation: Flux loops

field.name: Identifier

field.name: Flux
field.documentation: Measured flux.

field.name: Data
field.documentation: Measured flux.

field.name: Timebase

field.name: Bpol_Probes
field.documentation: Poloidal field probes

field.name: Name
field.documentation: Name of the probe

field.name: Identifier
field.documentation: ID of the probe

field.name: Centre_Position_RZPhi
field.documentation: R, Z, Phi position of coil centre

field.name: Poloidal_Angle
field.documentation: Poloidal angle of coil orientation

field.name: Toroidal_Angle
field.documentation: Toroidal angle of coil orientation (0 if fully in the poloidal plane)

field.name: Area
field.documentation: Area of the coil

field.name: Length
field.documentation: Length of the coil

field.name: Turns
field.documentation: Turns in the coil

field.name: Field
field.documentation: Measured magnetic field

field.name: Data
field.documentation: Measured magnetic field

field.name: Timebase
field.documentation: Generic timebase [s]

field.name: Processed_Data
field.documentation: Processed quantities derived from the magnetic measurements.

field.name: Method

field.documentation: Plasma current. Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewed from above

IDS.name: PF
IDS.documentation: Description of the axisymmetric active poloidal field (PF) coils, passive conductors, currents flowing in those and mutual electromagnetics effects; includes the limits of these systems; includes the forces on them; does not include non-axisymmetric coil systems

field.name: IDS_Properties
field.documentation: Interface Data Structure properties. This element identifies the node above as an IDS

field.name: Status_of
field.documentation: Status of this structure 'OK' if the structure was created consistently, 'PARTIAL' if not complete, 'INCONSISTENT' if complete but not guaranteed consistent

field.name: Comment_of
field.documentation: Any additional comment from the source application

field.name: Creator_of
field.documentation: Creator of this consistent IDS

field.name: Date_of
field.documentation: Date of consistent creation of this IDS

field.name: Source_of
field.documentation: Where do the data for this IDS come from (a procedure, a set of codes)

field.name: Reference_of
field.documentation: Documented reference to this IDS data

field.name: Homogeneous_Timebase
field.documentation: 1 if the Timebase of this IDS is homogeneous. In this case, the Timebase values for this IDS are stored in ../Timebase just below the root of this IDS. Otherwise, the time values are stored in the various Timebase fields at lower levels in the tree.

field.name: cocos
field.documentation: Coordinate conventions of this IDS

field.name: Coils
field.documentation: Active PF coils

field.name: Name
field.documentation: Name of the coil

field.name: Identifier
field.documentation: Alphanumeric identifier of coils used for convenience

field.name: Resistance
field.documentation: Coil resistance

field.name: Energy_Limit_Max
field.documentation: Maximum Energy to be dissipated in the coil

field.name: Elements
field.documentation: Each PF coil is comprised of a number of cross-section elements described individually

field.name: Name
field.documentation: Name of this element of this coil

field.name: Identifier
field.documentation: Identifier of this element of this coil

field.name: Turns_With_Sign
field.documentation: Number of effective turns in the element for calculating magnetic fields of the coil; includes the sign of the number of turns

field.name: Area
field.documentation: Cross-sectional areas of the element

field.name: Geometry
field.documentation: Cross-sectional shape of the element

field.name: Description_Type
field.documentation: Type used to describe the element shape (0 for 'Coordinates_RZ' or 1 for 'RZDRDZ')

field.name: Coordinates_RZ
field.documentation: Irregular outline of the element

field.name: RZDRDZ
field.documentation: 4-Vector defining Centre R,Z and full extents dR, dZ

field.name: Current
field.documentation: Current in the coil

field.name: Data
field.documentation: Current in the coil

field.name: Timebase
field.documentation: Generic timebase [s]

field.name: Voltage
field.documentation: Voltage on the coil terminals

field.name: Data
field.documentation: Voltage on the coil terminals

field.name: Timebase
field.documentation: Generic timebase [s]

field.name: Vertical_Forces
field.documentation: Vertical forces on the axisymmetric PF coil system

field.name: Names
field.documentation: Names of the Force combinations

field.name: Combinations
field.documentation: Coils involved in the Force combinations

field.name: Limits_Max
field.documentation: Vertical Force combinations limits

field.name: Limits_Min
field.documentation: Vertical Force combination limit

field.name: Forces
field.documentation: Force combinations. All forces are assumed to be on the same timebase

field.name: Timebase
field.documentation: Generic timebase [s]

field.name: Circuits
field.documentation: Circuits, connecting multiple PF coils to multiple supplies, defining the current and voltage relationships in the system

field.name: Name
field.documentation: Name of the circuit

field.name: Identifier
field.documentation: ID of the circuit

field.name: Type
field.documentation: Type of the circuit

field.name: Connections
field.documentation: Description of the supplies and coils connections (nodes) across the circuit. The matrix describing for each node (first dimension) which components are connected to it (1 if connected, 0 otherwise). There are 2 sides to each component, thus 2*ncomponents as the size of the second dimension, listing first all supplies, then all coils (in the same order as listed in SUPPLIES and COILS). An example can be found in the data structure documentation PFconnections.pdf (TBD)

field.name: Voltage
field.documentation: Voltage on the circuit

field.name: Data
field.documentation: Voltage on the circuit

field.name: Timebase
field.documentation: Generic timebase [s]

field.name: Current
field.documentation: Current in the circuit

field.name: Data
field.documentation: Current in the circuit

field.name: Timebase
field.documentation: Generic timebase [s]

field.name: Supplies
field.documentation: PF power supplies

field.name: Name
field.documentation: Name of the PF supply

field.name: Identifier
field.documentation: Identifier of the supply

field.name: Type
field.documentation: Type of the supply; TBD add free description of non-linear power supplies

field.name: Resistance
field.documentation: Power supply internal resistance

field.name: Delay
field.documentation: Pure delay in the supply

field.name: Filter_Numerator
field.documentation: Coefficients of the numerator, in increasing order : a0 + a1*s + ... + an*s^n; used for a linear supply description

field.name: Filter_Denominator
field.documentation: Coefficients of the denominator, in increasing order : b0 + b1*s + ... + bm*s^m; used for a linear supply description

field.name: Current_Limit_Max
field.documentation: Maximum current in the supply

field.name: Current_Limit_Min
field.documentation: Minimum current in the supply

field.name: Voltage_Limit_Max
field.documentation: Maximum voltage from the supply

field.name: Voltage_Limit_Min
field.documentation: Minimum voltage from the supply

field.name: Current_Limiter_Gain
field.documentation: Gain to prevent overcurrent in a linear model of the supply

field.name: Energy_Limit_Max
field.documentation: Maximum energy to be dissipated in the supply during a pulse

field.name: Nonlinear_Model
field.documentation: Description of the nonlinear transfer function of the supply STATIC

field.name: Voltage
field.documentation: Voltages at the supply output

field.name: Data
field.documentation: Voltages at the supply output

field.name: Timebase
field.documentation: Generic timebase [s]

field.name: Current
field.documentation: Current at the supply output, defined positive if it flows from point 1 to point 2 of the component in the pfcircuit description

field.name: Data
field.documentation: Current at the supply output, defined positive if it flows from point 1 to point 2 of the component in the pfcircuit description

field.name: Timebase
field.documentation: Generic timebase [s]

field.name: Passive_Loops
field.documentation: Passive axisymmetric conductor description in the form of non-connected loops; any connected loops are expressed as active coil circuits with no power supply attached.

field.name: Names
field.documentation: Names of the loops

field.name: Areas
field.documentation: Surface areas of the passive loops

field.name: Resistances
field.documentation: Passive elements resistances

field.name: Geometries
field.documentation: Shapes of the Passive Loops

field.name: Description_Type
field.documentation: Type used to describe the element shape (0 for 'Coordinates_RZ' or 1 for 'RZDRDZ')

field.name: Coordinates_RZ
field.documentation: Irregular outline of the element

field.name: RZDRDZ
field.documentation: 4-Vector defining Centre R,Z and full extents dR, dZ

field.name: Currents
field.documentation: Passive Loops currents (all Passive Loops are assumed to share the same timebase)

field.name: Timebase
field.documentation: Generic timebase [s]

field.name: Vacuum_Model
field.documentation: Electromagnetic Vacuum Model of the PF System, including both active and passive coils

field.name: Names
field.documentation: Names of circuits [Active;Passive]

field.name: Inductance_Matrix
field.documentation: Inductance matrix between circuits

field.name: Resistance_Vector
field.documentation: Resistances of PF coils

field.name: Code_Parameters
field.documentation: Generic decription of the code specific parameters for the code that has produced this IDS

field.name: Code_Name
field.documentation: Name of the code

field.name: Code_Version
field.documentation: Version of the code

field.name: Parameters
field.documentation: List of the code specific parameters in XML format

field.name: Output_Diagnostics
field.documentation: List of the code specific diagnostic/output in XML format

field.name: Output_Flag
field.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values mean some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used.

field.name: Timebase
field.documentation: Generic timebase [s]

IDS.name: SDN
IDS.documentation: Description of the Synchronous Data Network parameters and the signals on it

field.name: IDS_Properties
field.documentation: Interface Data Structure properties. This element identifies the node above as an IDS

field.name: Status_of
field.documentation: Status of this structure 'OK' if the structure was created consistently, 'PARTIAL' if not complete, 'INCONSISTENT' if complete but not guaranteed consistent

field.name: Comment_of
field.documentation: Any additional comment from the source application

field.name: Creator_of
field.documentation: Creator of this consistent IDS

field.name: Date_of
field.documentation: Date of consistent creation of this IDS

field.name: Source_of
field.documentation: Where do the data for this IDS come from (a procedure, a set of codes)

field.name: Reference_of
field.documentation: Documented reference to this IDS data

field.name: Homogeneous_Timebase
field.documentation: 1 if the Timebase of this IDS is homogeneous. In this case, the Timebase values for this IDS are stored in ../Timebase just below the root of this IDS. Otherwise, the time values are stored in the various Timebase fields at lower levels in the tree.

field.name: cocos
field.documentation: Coordinate conventions of this IDS

field.name: Allocatable_Signals
field.documentation: Dictionary of the signal names and definitions which can be allocated to the SDN

field.name: Names
field.documentation: Names of all the allocatable signals

field.name: Definitions
field.documentation: Definitions of the allocatable signals

field.name: Ip_Normalise
field.documentation: Is this signal multiplied by Ip to generate a control variable; this usage is specific to magnetic control, but could be extended to other control loops

field.name: Allocated_Signals
field.documentation: Allocation of signal names to positions in the SDN

field.name: Timebase
field.documentation: Generic timebase [s]

field.name: Signals
field.documentation: Data on the SDN

field.name: N_Topic_List
field.documentation: Number items in the vector of structures

field.name: Topic_List
field.documentation: List of the groups of signals used at different reading and writing points

field.name: Names
field.documentation: Names of the group of SDN signals

field.name: Indices
field.documentation: Indices into the current SDN allocated list; it must be updated when the allocated list is changed

IDS.name: TF
IDS.documentation: Toroidal field coils (all assumed to be identical). If individual description of coil is needed, use the same description as in PF IDS.

field.name: IDS_Properties
field.documentation: Interface Data Structure properties. This element identifies the node above as an IDS

field.name: Status_of
field.documentation: Status of this structure 'OK' if the structure was created consistently, 'PARTIAL' if not complete, 'INCONSISTENT' if complete but not guaranteed consistent

field.name: Comment_of
field.documentation: Any additional comment from the source application

field.name: Creator_of
field.documentation: Creator of this consistent IDS

field.name: Date_of
field.documentation: Date of consistent creation of this IDS

field.name: Source_of
field.documentation: Where do the data for this IDS come from (a procedure, a set of codes)

field.name: Reference_of
field.documentation: Documented reference to this IDS data

field.name: Homogeneous_Timebase
field.documentation: 1 if the Timebase of this IDS is homogeneous. In this case, the Timebase values for this IDS are stored in ../Timebase just below the root of this IDS. Otherwise, the time values are stored in the various Timebase fields at lower levels in the tree.

field.name: cocos
field.documentation: Coordinate conventions of this IDS

field.name: N_Turns
field.documentation: Number of total turns in a toroidal field coil

field.name: N_Coils
field.documentation: Number of coils around the tokamak

field.name: Current
field.documentation: Current in the coil

field.name: Data
field.documentation: Current in the coil

field.name: Timebase
field.documentation: Generic timebase [s]

field.name: Voltage
field.documentation: Voltage on the coil terminals

field.name: Data
field.documentation: Voltage on the coil terminals

field.name: Timebase
field.documentation: Generic timebase [s]

field.name: B_Tor_Vacuum_R
field.documentation: Vacuum field times major radius in the toroidal field magnet. Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewed from above

field.name: Data
field.documentation: Vacuum field times major radius in the toroidal field magnet. Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewed from above

field.name: Timebase
field.documentation: Generic timebase [s]

field.documentation: Generic timebase [s]
